tr.title: New York
tr.introduction: New York, 8.3 milyon nüfusuyla ABD'nin en büyük şehridir. Manhattan'ın gökdelenleri, Central Park'ın huzuru, Brooklyn'in sanat sahnesı ve Times Square'in enerjisi tek şehirde buluşur. Broadway müzikalleri, dünya mutfakları ve ikonik manzaralar sizi bekler.
tr.transportation: JFK'dan AirTrain + metro ile Manhattan'a ~75 dk ($10.75). MetroCard ile metro ve otobüs sınırsız — 7 gün $34. Uber/Lyft yaygın. Sarı taksi ikonik ama pahalı.
tr.accommodation: Midtown Manhattan merkezi ama pahalı ($200+). Brooklyn Williamsburg trendy ve daha uygun. Lower East Side genç ve enerjik. Hostel'ler $50-80/gece.
tr.museums: MoMA ($25), Met Museum (önerilen bağış $30), Guggenheim ($25), Whitney Museum, Doğa Tarihi Müzesi. CityPASS ile tasarruf edin.
tr.historicalPlaces: Özgürlük Heykeli + Ellis Island (feribot $24), Empire State Building ($44), Top of the Rock ($43), Brooklyn Köprüsü (ücretsiz yürüyüş), 9/11 Memorial (ücretsiz).
tr.restaurants: Joe's Pizza (klasik NY dilimi $3.50), Katz's Deli (pastrami efsane), Chelsea Market (food hall), Chinatown'da dim sum. Food truck kültürü çok güçlü.
tr.citizenship: ABD vatandaşlığı: Green Card ile 5 yıl ikamet (evlilik ile 3 yıl). İngilizce ve civics sınavı. Green Card lotaryası (DV Lottery) her yıl 55,000 kişiye. B1/B2 turist vizesi ile 6 ay kalış. H-1B çalışma vizesi sponsor gerektirir.

en.title: New York
en.summary: Capital of the world, the city that never sleeps
en.introduction: New York, with 8.3 million people, is the largest city in the USA. Manhattan's skyscrapers, Central Park's tranquility, Brooklyn's art scene, and Times Square's energy all come together. Broadway musicals, world cuisines, and iconic views await you.
en.transportation: From JFK: AirTrain + subway to Manhattan ~75 min ($10.75). MetroCard for unlimited subway and bus — 7 days $34. Uber/Lyft common. Yellow cab iconic but expensive.
en.accommodation: Midtown Manhattan central but expensive ($200+). Brooklyn Williamsburg trendy and more affordable. Lower East Side young and energetic. Hostels $50-80/night.
en.museums: MoMA ($25), Met Museum (suggested donation $30), Guggenheim ($25), Whitney Museum, Natural History Museum. Save with CityPASS.
en.historicalPlaces: Statue of Liberty + Ellis Island (ferry $24), Empire State Building ($44), Top of the Rock ($43), Brooklyn Bridge (free walk), 9/11 Memorial (free).
en.restaurants: Joe's Pizza (classic NY slice $3.50), Katz's Deli (legendary pastrami), Chelsea Market (food hall), dim sum in Chinatown. Food truck culture is very strong.
en.citizenship: US citizenship: 5 years residence with Green Card (3 years through marriage). English and civics exam. Green Card lottery (DV Lottery) 55,000 people annually. B1/B2 tourist visa for 6 months. H-1B work visa requires sponsor.
